summary: Enhanced textures for Paarthurnax and glowing lines on him. Installation menu lets you choose between 5 different glow colors or you can just select the enhanced textures.
descriptionHtml:
[center][color=#efefef][size=3]
Arngeir is actually the first Dragonborn but he didn't tell us.Â 
Paarthurnax is his father and he hates Alduin because he is not strong as he is.

So he shouts to call you. You climb all the steps up so he can train you to kill the Alduin.

It is pretty clear that Arngeir wants to be the strongest Dragonborn. But he doesn't know something.
The chicken at Riverwood is the actual Dragonborn.

How did we get here? Let me explain you. I'm out of imagination, it is really late.

You want to learn what this mod does? Alright, I'll explain that one then. Will tell the story when the Imprefvicticious Odahviing comes.

This mod enhances Arngeir's fathers textures and adds glowing lines on him. While installing, you get to choose between 5 different colors. Red, Blue, Pink, Deathwingish Orange and Yellow.

If you didn't like the colors, you can just choose ''Enhanced Textures'' and have a better Paarthurnax.[/size][/color]

[img]http://i.imgur.com/mU05vpx.gif[/img][/center]
[center][size=3]Why do you think only Arngeir can talk to you? Start thinking son!
You think you know everything?

THE CHICKEN KNOWS EVERYTHING![/size][/center]
author: ProtologolusX
